TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Majia, title = Majia, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Majia} }

S.FORM: Majia Nsgan Majia o gaga Nsgan Pingtung, kmpraan kana dxgal o 61.68 km , (dxgal dgiyaq o 11.05 km , dxgal pmblxan o 49.62 km ). kmhbragan hiyi o 6,757, sapah o 2,029, seejiq tnpusu 6,507 hiyi, knhbragan hiyi o 96 (Paywang, Rukay). Paywang, Rukay ka hbaraw balay alang hini. nyusan qpahan Nsgan Majia o niqan 6 alang ni maxal 10. 10 o, Paljur, Zayazayan, Vecekadan, Laulauzan, Payuwan, Kazangiljan, Wakaba, Masilid, Makazayazaya, Tjanavakung. pusupnyahan patas
